name: grace-shopper
description: A simple boilerplate for the PERN stack using Vite.js. It includes Node-Postgres v8.8, Express, React 18, React Router DOM v6.6, Morgan, Axios, jsonwebtoken, bcrypt, dotenv, and Nodemon.

scripts.build: cd client && npm install && npm run build && cd ..
scripts.start:dev: (npm run build --prefix client & npm run preview --prefix client) & nodemon index.js

author: Sean Hagstrom
